greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of psi(-q^3) / f(q) where psi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) := Prod_{k>=1} (1-(-q)^k) (see A121373), phi(q) := theta_3(q) := Sum_{k=-oo..oo} q^(k^2) (A000122), psi(q) := Sum_{k=0..oo} q^(k*(k+1)/2) (A010054), chi(q) := Prod_{k>=0} (1+q^(2k+1)) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of q^(-1/3) * eta(q) * eta(q^3) * eta(q^4) * eta(q^12) / (eta(q^2)^3 * eta(q^6)) in powers of q.
G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (108 t)) = 3^(-1/2) g(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t) and g() is g.f. for A139136.
mathematica: A139135[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[(QPochhammer[q]* QPochhammer[q^3]*QPochhammer[q^4]*QPochhammer[q^12])/(QPochhammer[q^2]^3 *QPochhammer[q^6]), {q, 0, n}]; Table[A139135[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 05 2017 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) * eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^4 + A) * eta(x^12 + A) / (eta(x^2 + A)^3 * eta(x^6 + A)), n))}
xref: Apart from signs, same as A097197.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Apr 10 2008
